title: I GOT CHAT BANNED FOR THIS?!
body:
Game 1
In-Game
PermaToxin: Ouph
PermaToxin: u hard counter me and i took the wrong runes
PermaToxin: Ya
PermaToxin: kk
PermaToxin: dont freeze
PermaToxin: vi is nearby'
PermaToxin: its norms you big baby
PermaToxin: mb
PermaToxin: mb again
PermaToxin: can i kill ur other laners
PermaToxin: back
PermaToxin: come now.
PermaToxin: it wasnt my idea
PermaToxin: stfu
PermaToxin: fiora is my bae
PermaToxin: they are lying
PermaToxin: U trust me right bae
PermaToxin: yall really get your panties in a knot over a game
PermaToxin: then find a new game
PermaToxin: This game isnt that
PermaToxin: * when will u notice this is my smurf*
PermaToxin: Do what
PermaToxin: lmao, shes a good player
PermaToxin: nah my main is Gold. Shes a hard counter to me, i have the wrong runes
PermaToxin: Why yall so mad?
PermaToxin: I only gave her 2
PermaToxin: 2 or 3
PermaToxin: idk
PermaToxin: boys
PermaToxin: Its a deadass game
PermaToxin: that you are getting mad about
PermaToxin: this isnt real
PermaToxin: its something on a screen
PermaToxin: realize you will live :')
PermaToxin: 3/6
PermaToxin: 2/6
PermaToxin: im the onlyone that doesnt have a negative KDA
PermaToxin: but its my fault
PermaToxin: seems legit
PermaToxin: i also have the best CS
PermaToxin: but they flame me for bad CS
PermaToxin: Yall on sum
PermaToxin: now im the only one with a positive KDA
PermaToxin: but i keep getting flamed
PermaToxin: I didnt tho
PermaToxin: 8 kills
PermaToxin: 3 deaths
PermaToxin: dumb bitch
PermaToxin: u just suck
PermaToxin: so your mad
PermaToxin: um so im the bad one
PermaToxin: but look at the clown fiesta top
PermaToxin: Yall see the problem
PermaToxin: ur all feedingt
PermaToxin: except me
PermaToxin: your all delusional
PermaToxin: what was that abt KS'ing vayne
PermaToxin: But its my fault we lost
PermaToxin: Its my fault
PermaToxin: mhm
PermaToxin: *the only good player on my team*

Thats my chat log. yall really think i did something wrong? (My entire team was flaming, this was a norm, and They were mad bc Me and Fiora had a passive lane.

replies.body: If by wrong you mean broke the rules, then yes, you did something wrong. There are no stipulations in the rules that allow you to call someone a dumb bitch and tell people they suck. Yes this is punishable use of chat.

Things like "stfu" and "dumb bitch" and "u just suck" and constant needling about scores are not acceptable behavior according to LoL's rules. Whatever the rest of your team was doing doesn't factor into your punishment.

PermaToxin: dumb bitch
PermaToxin: u just suck

> PermaToxin: stfu

Barely toxic

> PermaToxin: its norms you big baby

Mildly Toxic

> PermaToxin: yall really get your panties in a knot over a game

Moderately Toxic

> PermaToxin: then find a new game
> PermaToxin: im the onlyone that doesnt have a negative KDA
> PermaToxin: but its my fault

Severely Toxic

> PermaToxin: dumb bitch
> PermaToxin: u just suck
> PermaToxin: ur all feedingt
> PermaToxin: except me
> PermaToxin: your all delusional
> PermaToxin: the only good player on my team

Profoundly Toxic

---

OP's username checks out. Your chat was certainly punishment worthy.
I just feel like they said much worse things to me, I do not understand why I was not allowed to say what I said.
